Plot: In a world where giant humanoid Titans prey on humans, Eren joins the scouting legion to get revenge on the monsters who killed everyone in his town.
Title: Attack on Titan: Part 1
Writer: Hajime Isayama (manga), Yûsuke Watanabe (screenplay), Tomohiro Machiyama (screenplay)
Actors: Haruma Miura, Kiko Mizuhara, Kanata Hongô, Satomi Ishihara
